title: Figure out "remind me later" and "don't show me these anymore"
body: > For recommendations we'll want to allow users to decide they don't any more. For things like the update recommendation or moving users off beta AND recommendations, we'd want users to be able to delay the prompt for a period of time and then have it resurface.
